item.title: Using AWS JavaScript SDK v3 in Browsers
item.description: In this article, I will walkthrough the process of incorporating the “new” AWS JavaScript SDK in a web application, particularly how to use it directly in browsers. I wrote this because I found relevant documentation a bit lacking. Also, the idea can be applied to using TypeScript in browsers in general. Introduction to AWS SDK for JavaScript v3 AWS have recently released Version 3 of the SDK for JavaScript, targeting the following issues of its previous version (V2):
